channel.title: Infinite spec?

item.title: Infinite spec?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[quote=“Evan`, post:9, topic:192267”][quote author=-Legend- link=topic=256004.msg2131200#msg2131200 date=1206326759]

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1277 && specialAmount > 100){
specialAtk(true, 80, 282);
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(5);
}lol

Please die. That says it will only perform the special if special energy is above 100.
[/quote]HUMAN MAKES ERROR, HOW EVER COULD IT EVER HAVE HAPPENED[/quote]

Please shut up and go leech more tutorials.

Read full topic

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1277 && specialAmount > 10){ specialAtk(true, 80, 282); specialAmount == 100; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(5); }

item.title: Infinite spec?

looks like this :
